>
[Slime Whip](/Equipment.aspx?ID=792)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Slithering</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 61

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This thick, greasy _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shifting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=302) [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)_ is made from a slimy pseudopod. You don't take the usual –2 circumstance penalty to your attack rolls when using the slime whip to make a lethal attack. The whip's form can be changed just like any weapon with the _shifting_ rune, but it reverts to its original form as soon as it isn't wielded. When in its whip form, you can use the following action.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> command, Interact;  **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** For 1 round, the slime whip deals acid damage rather than slashing damage. If the attack deals [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), the persistent damage is also acid damage instead of its usual type.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
